EmailTemplate.name: Payroll Corrections - Correction Update
EmailTemplate.subject: Payroll Corrections - Correction Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
I have entered some information for your employees. Tomorrow I will continue to enter the rest of the information you requested.
You can review these changes in your audit history. I will do my best to complete the remainder of your request before the end of the next business day.
Feel free to contact me if you have any further information to provide and I will get back with you as soon as I can.
Warmest Regards, {!Case.Case_Owner_First_Name__c} Intuit Payroll Corrections Team Member
This is an automated email. Please do not reply directly as you will not receive a response.
